title: What do you think the reason on why until now has conflict or issues regarding historical account still exist? - Quora

response.answer_text: Conflicting histories are as old as written history. They begin with WAR. In any WAR, nation-A tells many lies about nation-B. Nation-B tells many lies about nation-A. At the end of the WAR, the victor’s version of history is generally the one that becomes most widespread — HOWEVER — the vanquished nation (almost) NEVER forgets its own version of history. In the course of the centuries, the “losing” nation’s history can make a “comeback.” This happened hundreds of times for hundreds of nations over thousands of years. So — conflict of historical narrative is extremely common — and may be the most ancient legacy of all literature.

Historieans used to be employees of rulers ! Each ruler had his own historians who told that he ws the best and his opponents were bastards … So each of these historians contradicted his contemporaries employed by the other sides !
